original_text: And I will make the land of Egypt desolate in the midst of the countries that are desolate, and her cities among the cities that are laid waste shall be desolate forty years: and I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, and will disperse them through the countries.
korean_text: 내가 애굽 땅을 황폐한 나라들 같이 황폐하게 하며 애굽 성읍도 사막이 된 나라들의 성읍 같이 사십 년 동안 황폐하게 하고 애굽 사람들은 각국 가운데로 흩으며 여러 민족 가운데로 헤치리라

sentences.original_text: And I will make the land of Egypt desolate
in the midst of countries that are desolate
and her cities among cities that are laid waste
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 도시들은 폐허가 된 도시들 가운데서

sentences.original_text: and I will scatter the Egyptians among nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 애굽 사람들을 여러 나라 가운데 흩으리라

sentences.original_text: and will disperse them through countries
